name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Highly skilled Amazon Connect Engineer with over 13 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in **AWS Services** and proficient with **Infrastructure as Code** tools, including **CloudFormation** and **Terraform**. Expertise in **Python** and **JavaScript** for building robust applications, aligned with modern best practices in **CI/CD** and cloud-native architecture. Proven ability to leverage **DynamoDB**, **Lambda**, **Step Functions**, **S3**, **Kinesis**, and **EventBridge** to enhance system efficiency and reliability. Strong experience with **Amazon Connect**, **CloudWatch**, **CloudTrail**, **API Gateway**, **Amazon Lex**, and **CloudFront** for optimizing customer interactions and backend workflows.

Demonstrates exceptional technical problem-solving skills and possesses excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities. Adept at working independently with flexibility, consistently influencing positive outcomes across teams. Background in developing high-performance applications in healthcare and finance complements my technical strengths.
